renderToPlaceholder ( $  script,
$  placeholder 
)

Renders a template and stores the rendered output as a placeholder variable for later use.

Parameters:
$scriptThe template script to render
$placeholderThe placeholder variable name in which to store the rendered output
Returns:
void
